statements: SELECT * FROM debt_management_team WHERE debtor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debt_management_team ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, age_of_debt FROM debt_management_team WHERE age_of_debt < 30;
SELECT debtor_name, recovery_rate, collection_efficiency FROM debt_management_team ORDER BY recovery_rate ASC, collection_efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM debt_management_team WHERE debt_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM debt_management_team WHERE debt_amount > 1000 ORDER BY debtor_name ASC
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, recovery_rate FROM debt_management_team WHERE age_of_debt < 30 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC
SELECT debtor_name, collection_efficiency FROM debt_management_team WHERE recovery_rate < 0.6 ORDER BY collection_efficiency ASC, age_of_debt DESC
SELECT id, debtor_name, debt_amount, age_of_debt, collection_efficiency FROM debt_management_team WHERE collection_efficiency > 0.7 ORDER BY age_of_debt ASC, debt_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM debt_management_team WHERE debt_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND recovery_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY debtor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM debt_management_teams;
SELECT team_name, recovery_rate FROM debt_management_teams ORDER BY recovery_rate DESC;
SELECT recovery_rate, collection_efficiency FROM debt_management_teams WHERE debt_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM debt_management_teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, debt_age, collection_efficiency FROM debt_management_teams WHERE recovery_rate < 0.9;
SELECT * FROM debt_management_teams WHERE collection_efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT team_name, recovery_rate FROM debt_management_teams ORDER BY recovery_rate DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debt_records WHERE debt_status = 'overdue';
SELECT * FROM debt_records WHERE debt_amount > 5000 AND debt_status = 'current';
SELECT team_name, SUM(debt_amount) AS total_debt FROM debt_management_teams JOIN debt_records ON debt_management_teams.id = debt_records.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = true;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE debtor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT collection_id, collection_amount FROM collections WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = TRUE
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors WHERE debtor_id = 10 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM debtors JOIN debts ON debtors.debtor_id = debts.debtor_id WHERE debt_amount > 5000
SELECT debt_id, debt_age_days FROM debts WHERE debt_age_days < 30 AND debt_amount > 1000 ORDER BY debt_id DESC
SELECT collection_id, collection_amount FROM collections WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM debt_management_teams;
SELECT rate_id, recovery_rate FROM recovery_rates ORDER BY recovery_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM aging_of_debts WHERE debt_age > 60;
SELECT team_name, efficiency_rate, efficiency_date FROM debt_management_teams INNER JOIN collection_efficiency ON debt_management_teams.team_id = collection_efficiency.team_id;
SELECT team_name, recovery_rate FROM debt_management_teams INNER JOIN recovery_rates ON debt_management_teams.team_id = recovery_rates.team_id WHERE recovery_rate > 80;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM debt_management_teams;
SELECT recovery_rate, team_id FROM recovery_rates ORDER BY recovery_rate DESC;
SELECT debt_amount, debt_age FROM aging_of_debts WHERE debt_age > 30;

SELECT team_name, efficiency_rate, efficiency_date FROM collection_efficiency JOIN debt_management_teams ON collection_efficiency.team_id = debt_management_teams.team_id ORDER BY efficiency_rate ASC, efficiency_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_efficiency WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM debtors;
SELECT debtor_id, name, address FROM debtors ORDER BY debtor_id DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, name, phone_number FROM debtors WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM debts WHERE due_date < '2022-10-31';
SELECT debtor_id, amount, due_date FROM debts ORDER BY amount DESC, due_date ASC;
SELECT debtor_id, name, address, phone_number FROM debtors;
SELECT debt_id, debtor_id, amount, due_date, status FROM debts ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT debt_id, recovery_rate, aging_of_debts, collection_efficiency FROM collection_metrics WHERE recovery_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY collection_efficiency DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, location FROM teams WHERE location = 'New York';
